abstract.p: Correction of May 28 article about transsexual Calpernia Addams and murder of boyfriend, Pfc Barry Winchell; lawyer Kathi Westcott, in meeting with Addams and gay rights advocate Rhonda White, did not say that Addams, for sake of clarity, should tell reporters to refer to her as male; White and Westcott did not make specific proposal about how press should refer to Addams (S)

block.p: Because of an editing error, an article on May 28 about Calpernia Addams, who is in the process of changing sexes to female from male, and the murder of her boyfriend, Pfc. Barry Winchell, included an erroneous statement about a meeting between Addams and Kathi Westcott, a lawyer, and Rhonda White, a gay rights advocate, after the murder. Westcott did not say that Addams, ''for the sake of clarity,'' should tell reporters to refer to her as a male. White and Westcott discussed the press with Addams but did not make a specific proposal about how the press should refer to her.

Because of an editing error, an article on May 28 about Calpernia Addams, who is in the process of changing sexes to female from male, and the murder of her boyfriend, Pfc. Barry Winchell, included an erroneous statement about a meeting between Addams and Kathi Westcott, a lawyer, and Rhonda White, a gay rights advocate, after the murder. Westcott did not say that Addams, ''for the sake of clarity,'' should tell reporters to refer to her as a male. White and Westcott discussed the press with Addams but did not make a specific proposal about how the press should refer to her.
